CISC3003 Practice 02: Share Your Travel Photos

In this Practice we learn how to use img tag

  • Example for img 
    <img src="/images/testlogo.png" alt="logo">

    • The first point is about Relative File Path and Absolute File Path

    CISC3003 Practice 04: Share Your Travel Photos

    In this Practice we learn how to use table tag

    CISC3003: Practice 04

    Share Your Travels

    let us know where you've been

    This is a form

    Photo Details












    Attribution
    Noncommercial
    No Derivative Works
    I accept the software license








  • Example for table 
    <table>
  <tr>
    <td colspan="2">
      <label for="title">Title</label>
      <br />
      <input
        type="text"
        name="title"
        id="title"
        placeholder="Give your photo a decriptive name"
      />
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <td colspan="2">
      <label for="description"> Description </label>
      <br />
      <textarea
        id="description"
        name="description"
        rows="5"
        cols="61"
        placeholder="Adding a rich description will help with search results"
      ></textarea>
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>
